GapFillInput.Title: like doing and would like to do
GapFillInput.Instruction:
Choose the correct form using the information in the brackets ( ).
Type your answer in each gap and use short forms if possible.

Content.Question:
1. Laura really likes (Laura / really like) going to the gym.
2. Do you like (you / like) flying?
3. What would you like to do (you / like / do) tonight?
4. They'd like to have (They / like / have) a big family one day.
5. Does Henry like (Henry / like) driving fast?
6. Would you like (you / like) to go for a walk?
7. I'd like to speak (I / like / speak) to Adele Young, please.
8. Why would you like to be (you / like / be) a dancer when you grow up?
9. Isabella doesn't like (Isabella / not / like) swimming in the lake.
